content.value: Thank you to everyone that donated! We have raised over $2000 and the funds were used to make 100 care packages that were donated to Toronto shelters.
Read our blog update here to learn more about the donations
With the frigid temperatures and heavy snowfall of the Canadian winter upon us, Blankets for T.O. is organizing a January Blanket Drive to help keep the homeless warm!
Join the cause by making a donation on our GoFundMe page here
Share the link with your friends, family, classmates and colleagues!Â
For each $2 donated in this Blanket Drive, you will be able to provide a warm thermal blanket for a homeless individual.
Watch our January Blanket Drive video
, which summarizes the goals of Blankets for T.O. and our blanket drive.
To start off this drive, we initially aimed for a goal of $500
which is enough for 250 blankets! Based on support for this drive, we will be changing this goal accordingly.

All proceeds of the fundraiser will go directly towards buying thermal blankets for the homeless population in the Greater Toronto Area. These high-quality thermal blankets will provide the homeless with a warm, portable, waterproof and highly visible covering for the winter.
Due to overwhelming attention given to this initiative, we are raising our goal to $2000!
Thank you to all those that have donated and shared this initiative!
Follow us on our social media (
) to learn more about our organization! Thanks for your support!
